topic: Research Papers on AI Impact and Ethics

  entities:
    Christopher Summerfield|Researcher
    Ameet Deshpande|Researcher
    Jiangjie Chen|Researcher
    Adriana Placani|Researcher
    Charbel-Raphael Segerie|Researcher

  proposition: Christopher Summerfield et al. published a research paper on the potential impact of advanced AI systems on democracy.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Christopher Summerfield|AUTHORED|research paper on AI systems and democracy
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Christopher Summerfield|RESEARCHES|AI systems
    Christopher Summerfield|STUDIES|democracy

  proposition: Ameet Deshpande et al. explored the opportunities and risks of anthropomorphization of AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ameet Deshpande|AUTHORED|research on AI anthropomorphization
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Ameet Deshpande|STUDIES|AI anthropomorphization

  proposition: Jiangjie Chen et al. conducted a survey on role-playing language agents from persona to personalization.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiangjie Chen|AUTHORED|survey on role-playing language agents
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jiangjie Chen|RESEARCHES|language agents

  proposition: Adriana Placani wrote about anthropomorphism in AI, discussing hype and fallacy.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Adriana Placani|AUTHORED|research on AI anthropomorphism
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Adriana Placani|STUDIES|AI anthropomorphism

  proposition: Charbel-Raphael Segerie published a landscape of AI safety strategies.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Charbel-Raphael Segerie|AUTHORED|landscape of AI safety strategies
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Charbel-Raphael Segerie|RESEARCHES|AI safety

    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|ANNOUNCED_BY|OpenAI

    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-3.5 Turbo|UPDATED_BY|OpenAI

    entity-attribute relationships:
